# Left Side


```{r}

sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'q0_1',
  label = "How comfortable are you with using visualizations as a form of information sharing?",
  option = c(
    'Very uncomfortable - I find visualizations confusing and much prefer receiving information through text or verbal explanations'   = 'option_1',
    'Somewhat uncomfortable - I can understand basic charts but often struggle to interpret more complex visualizations or extract key insights from them'   = 'option_2',
    'Moderately comfortable - I\'m fine with standard visualizations like bar charts and line graphs, but complex or interactive visualizations can be overwhelming'  = 'option_3',
    'Quite comfortable - I can easily interpret most types of visualizations and often find them more effective than text for understanding data and trends' = 'option_4',
    'Extremely comfortable - I love working with visualizations of all types. I find them intuitive, can quickly extract insights from complex charts, and prefer visual information over text when possible' = 'option_5'
  )
)


sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'q0_2',
  label = "What kind of data relationship does a scatter plot typically show?",
  option = c(
    'Distribution of categories'    = 'option_1',
    'Proportions within a whole'    = 'option_2',
    'Relationship between two numerical variables'    = 'option_3',
        'Sequence over time' = 'option_4'
  )
)


sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'q0_3',
  label = "What do individual points on a scatter plot represent?",
  option = c(
    'Categories'    = 'option_1',
    'Data records or observations'    = 'option_2',
    'Statistical summaries'    = 'option_3',
        'Totals per group' = 'option_4'
  )
)



sd_question(
  type  = 'mc',
  id    = 'q0_4',
  label = "In a scatter plot, what does the size or color of points typically represent (if used)?",
  option = c(
    'Axis value'    = 'option_1',
    'Category grouping or a third variable'    = 'option_2',
    'Random styling'    = 'option_3',
        'Statistical error' = 'option_4'
  )
)



## Large Language Models Usage

sd_question(
  type   = "matrix",
  id     = "llm_preference",
  label  = "How often do you use LLM's for the following",
  row    = c(
    "Content Creation & Writing" = "CC",
    "Content Enhancement & Editing" = "CE",
    "Research & Information" = "RI",
    "Technical & Programming" = "TP",
    "Communication & Language" = "CL",
    "Productivity & Organization" = "PO",
    "Media & Analysis" = "MA"
  ),
  option = c(
    "Never" = "option_1",
    "Less than once a month"  = "option_2",
    "Monthly "    = "option_3",
    "Weekly"  = "option_4",
    "Daily"    = "option_5"
  )
)




### Please answer all the questions based on the visualizations in the dashboard [Link](https://0198214b-5aa5-077c-9e85-2da7df32aac5.share.connect.posit.cloud/)


sd_question(

  id    = "unique_id",
  label = "Enter the Unique Key you see on the dashboard"
)

sd_question(

  id    = 'q1',
  label = "Which region appears to specialize in high-performance, low-efficiency vehicles?",
  option = c(
    'European manufacturers'    = 'European',
    'Japanese manufacturers'    = 'Japanese',
    'US manufacturers'    = 'US',
        'All regions are similar' = 'All'
  )
)

sd_question(
  type  = "textarea",
  id    = "q1_reason",
  label = "What was your reasoning for that response?"
)

    'Low horsepower and low MPG'    = 'option_3',
    'Low horsepower and high MPG' = 'option_4'
  )
)

sd_question(

)

sd_question(

)

sd_question(
```
